name: COVID19PotentialExposureSNOMED
title: COVID19 Potential Exposure (SNOMED)
description: Given the variability in coding of diagnoses, this value set will be most useful with robust mapping of source data to the reference terms.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intended to support surveillance and monitoring of COVID19 infection),(Data Element Scope: Compilation of SNOMED codes for potential COVID19 exposure; Includes nonspecific codes which have been commonly used in practice during the pandemic to indicate potential exposure),(Inclusion Criteria: Potential exposure to COVID19 virus, including known exposure with consistent signs and symptoms and asymptomatic individuals with potential exposure.),(Exclusion Criteria: Confirmed infection, Suspected infection)

concept.display: Exposure to severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (event)
